DOC.brief_summary: The purpose research study learn long hypertonic saline ( HS ) work healthy subject . Inhaled hypertonic saline one medication use treat Cystic Fibrosis ( CF ) . In CF common lung disease like chronic bronchitis , mucus build lung . Hypertonic saline medication currently develop may help patient lung disease speed mucus clearance lung . For treatment effective , likely need able act lease several hour . Investigators able measure lung treatment like hypertonic saline work conduct Mucociliary Clearance ( MCC ) scan . Currently , investigator know long hypertonic saline work people CF . Investigators plan use information improve design test new treatment patient chronic bronchitis . Objectives : 1 . The investigator use MCC measurement determine durability action hypertonic saline healthy ( i.e . non-CF ) subject . 2 . The investigator determine intra- inter-individual variability baseline MCC measurement use slow inhalation/large particle protocol healthy subject guide future sample size calculation .
DOC.brief_title: Study Characterize Durability Hypertonic Saline Enhance Mucociliary Clearance Healthy Subjects
DOC.criteria: Healthy subject , without respiratory cardiac comorbidities Age 1855 year , inclusive FEV1 > 80 % predict FEV1/FVC ratio > 70 % Nonpregnant female subject must either sexually active , postmenopausal , surgically sterilize , agree use appropriate `` doublebarrier '' method ( diaphragm condom ) ; , must currently use prescribe transdermal , injection , implant , oral contraceptive study participation Subjects capable provide write informed consent participate study History smoking > 10 packyears Any history smoking within 60 day screen Acute upper low respiratory illness within 30 day screen Respiratory medication indication within 30 day screen History asthma , chronic bronchitis , chronic lung disease History intolerance hypertonic saline Women pregnant , lactating , childbearing potential unwilling use acceptable method contraception throughout duration study .
